alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 4:21PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern San Diego County through 500 PM PST... At 420 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Descanso to near Solana Beach. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chula Vista, El Cajon, National City, La Mesa, Poway, Coronado, Del Mar, Alpine, Mission Valley, Hillcrest, Linda Vista, North Park, Tierrasanta, University City, Downtown San Diego, I-8 Between Pine Valley And Boulevard, La Jolla, Midway District Including Lindbergh Field, I-8 Between Boulevard And Imperial County Line and Santee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
